Title: Requires website operators to allow minors who have posted certain content to remove such content
Summary: Requires website operators to allow minors who have posted certain content to remove such content; defines terms; requires website operators to provide notice to all minors that such minors may remove, or request removal of, content or information posted on the operator's Internet website, online service, online application, or mobile application by the registered users; makes exceptions; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง390-bb, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring website operators to allow minors who have posted certain content to remove such content
